lead_paragraph: Pau Gasol said it was special to face Kobe Bryant one last time on Sunday night.

headline.main: Bulls Beat Lakers 126-115 to Spoil Kobe's Chicago Farewell
headline.print_headline: Bulls Beat Lakers 126-115 to Spoil Kobe's Chicago Farewell

snippet: Pau Gasol said it was special to face Kobe Bryant one last time on Sunday night....
